    • createOrder

      public void createOrder​(ca.concordia.patterns.command.Order o)
      This method is used to create the order of the commands by adding target, source and number of armies in the list
      Parameters:
      o - An object of class Order is passed as an argument which will be used to add a specific passed order in the list.

    • nextOrder

      public ca.concordia.patterns.command.Order nextOrder()
      The player class must also have a next_order() (no parameters) method that is called by the GameEngine during the execute orders phase and returns the first order in the playerâ€™s list of orders, then removes it from the list
      Returns:
      l_ToReturn will return the list of orders
